election_record.label: New Jersey 1807 Governor

overview.note: "On Friday last, both Houses of the Legislature were convened in Joint meeting for the purpose of choosing a Governor of the State for the ensuing year; when his Excellency Joseph Bloomfield, was re-elected Governor, without Opposition." The Intelligencer, and Weekly Advertiser (Lancaster, PA). November 10, 1807.

election_record.reference: The Intelligencer, and Weekly Advertiser (Lancaster, PA). November 10, 1807.
